item.title: LAMP Installation and Config
item.description: Install phpMyAdmin on Centos 8 Step 1: Install phpMyAdmin The phpMyAdmin tool is not included in the default CentOS 8 repositories. However, the file can be download manually. wget https://files.phpmyadmin.net/phpMyAdmin/4.9.4/phpMyAdmin-4.9.4-all-languages.zip Extract the .zip file archive: unzip phpMyAdmin-4.9.4-all-languages.zip Move the extracted files to the /usr/share/phpmyadmin directory: sudo mv phpMyAdmin-4.9.4-all-languages.zip /usr/share/phpmyadmin Change directories: cd /usr/share/phpmyadmin Rename the sample php configuration file: sudo mv config.
